Player History
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 3/3/1987 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/27/1988 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Traded from Chicago to Montreal on 5/11/1989 (Going to MON: CF Ken Griffey Jr., 1B Cecil Fielder, C Craig Biggio, C Rick Wilkins. Going to CHC: P Randy Johnson)...
Had first career hit on 5/12/1989, off Calvin Schiraldi (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/12/1989, off Calvin Schiraldi (NYM)...
Injured on 6/15/1989 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Had 6 hits with 3 RBI against Atlanta on 6/26/1990...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1990, hitting .312 with 23 HR, 87 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1990...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Drove in 8 runs against Los Angeles on 7/6/1991...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1991...
Injured on 4/12/1992 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Philadelphia on 5/4/1992...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 6/2/1992...
Drove in 8 runs against Philadelphia on 6/3/1992...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 7/17/1992...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/1992, hitting .538 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1992...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $7,942,857 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/1993, hitting .348 with 6 HR, 17 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/1993, hitting .435 with 6 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
